verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
"Consider Him"
Let Christ thy pattern be
And know that He hath
Apprehended thee
To share His very life
His power divine
And in the likeness
Of thy Lord to shine

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
"Consider Him"
So shalt thou day by day
Seek out the lowliest place
And therein stay
Content to pass away
a thing of naught
That glory to the Father's name
Be brought

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Shrink not O child of God
But fearless go
Down into death with Jesus
Thou shalt know
The power of an endless life begin
With glorious liberty from self and sin

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
"Consider Him"
And thus thy life shall be
Filled with self-sacrifice and purity
God will work out in thee
The pattern true
And Christ's example ever keep in view

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
"Consider Him" and as you run the race
Keep ever upward looking in His face
And thus transformed
Illumined thou shalt be
And Christ's own image
Shall be seen in thee.
